title: New heathbars not showing up?
body: I see new health bars and animations on PBE, i saw streamers with it, etc but i dont have it and cannot find it in settings. can someone help?

replies.body: Looking for it on live, ive seen streamers with it
Were you looking for those updated healthbars on your PBE account or Live NA account? The PBE runs on a different patch so those features won't be on live servers.

why has riot deiced to give emotes out as rewards and not label them to know why we got them? 

why is urf the manatee so low quality compared to champion riven?

> [{quoted}](name=StrikeZone,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nc4OBEU2,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-10T02:49:38.860+0000)
>
> why has riot deiced to give emotes out as rewards and not label them to know why we got them?

I wish the emotes were labeled, at least in a tooltip, too. 

It sounds like you're talking about the "veteran rewards" emotes. You can tell which one you got, and why, by checking your "Completed Missions" log. Just open up your Mission Log and click the "View Completed" link at the bottom of the list. You should have a quest named "Defender of the League", "Champion of the League", or "Conqueror of the League".

For more information on how those rewards were earned, check out the [Preseason Update FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908) page.

>**Q**: Are there any other rewards for veterans coming this preseason?

>**A**: We're planning to give out exclusive emotes based on how many hours you've put in since the beginning of League. Playing approximately 500 hours gets you the Defender of the League emote, at around 1,500 hours gets you the Champion of the League emote, and 2,500 hours gets you the ultra-rare Conqueror of the League emote. The cutoff for game hours is August 31, 2017.
